segments.text: This'd better be good . I'm about to fire you all and find another company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've brought you a little something from the place down the street , Kitty Cafe-Jamaican Blue Mountain coffee beans !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmm , smells good . Sure better than my instant . But please don't tell me this is another coffee-themed pitch . I thought I told you ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ... yes , but this one has an all-new buzz .
segments.speaker: S2
